rows.label: qev086801_MSG0001
rows.name: I'm sorry, but my answer must remain no.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0002
rows.name:
I still don't see how this is asking too much,
considering what we've done for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0003
rows.name: You must understand...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0004
rows.name: We know that Rock is being pursued by the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0005
rows.name: And yet we offered him asylum here in NLA nonetheless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0006
rows.name:
Don't you see? In doing so, we have increased
the odds of our city coming under attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0007
rows.name:
Your people were in a state of war
with the Ganglion long before we arrived![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0008
rows.name: That is correct.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0009
rows.name: Which is precisely why I'm proposing we unite against them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0010
rows.name:
We don't ask him to fight alone—
merely that he lends his strength to ours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0011
rows.name: Does that request seem so unreasonable?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0012
rows.name:
A being like Rock would be a great asset in the field.
It would be a shame to see that go to waste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0013
rows.name: Are you making deals here, or threats?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0014
rows.name: Hey, everybody![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0015
rows.name: I simply propose a mutually beneficial agreement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0016
rows.name: I do not appreciate your characterizing it as a threat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_JNK0010
rows.name: Rebut

rows.label: qev086801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what part of this is mutual.

rows.label: qev086801_JNK0020
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev086801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask why Rock has to fight.

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0017
rows.name: Yeah. Rock doesn't want to fight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0018
rows.name: And I respect his right to choose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0019
rows.name:
He is welcome to refuse to contribute to this city—
and then leave it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0020
rows.name: That's horrible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0021
rows.name: I'm afraid New LA simply cannot spare resources for the idle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0022
rows.name:
Especially those who require such
a prodigious amount of food.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0023
rows.name: I am offering him a way to earn his keep as a citizen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0024
rows.name: But sir, Rock is a pacifist. He doesn't want to fight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0025
rows.name: Thank you, truly. But it is all right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0026
rows.name: What do you mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0027
rows.name:
Rock and I shall discuss the matter
and come to a decision shortly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0028
rows.name: Is that satisfactory?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0029
rows.name: Of course. I do hope you can both see reason in this matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0030
rows.name: Don't worry about him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0031
rows.name:
We have plenty of noncombatants around here.
BLADE membership is entirely voluntary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0032
rows.name: But I feel terrible for not fighting when I'm so big.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0033
rows.name: It's just...selfish, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0034
rows.name: It's not selfish, Rock—you are a kind and beautiful soul.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0035
rows.name: Never be ashamed for choosing peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0036
rows.name: Pretty lady is correct![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0037
rows.name: Tatsu not fight once in whole life, and Tatsu never feel shame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0038
rows.name: Thanks...I think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0039
rows.name: Bide here a moment, Rock. I have an idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0040
rows.name: Where you going?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086801_MSG0041
rows.name: Do not worry about a thing. Just give me a little time.[ST:wait ]
